<title level="1" right="Trait">[Scatter](/Traits.aspx?ID=413)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 235</row>

This weapon fires a cluster of pellets in a wide spray. Scatter always has an area listed with it, indicating the radius of the spray. On a hit, the primary target of attacks with a scatter weapon take the listed damage, and the target and all other creatures within the listed radius around it take 1 point of [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage per weapon damage die.
